public class CFComponentMenu
extends CFComponent

A class that represents a contextual menu on the tabletop.

positionMenuItemsLeftAndRight

public void positionMenuItemsLeftAndRight()
Positions the first two menu items to the left and right of the owner component. Other items in this menu remain in the same position.

repositionMenuItemsInCircle

public void repositionMenuItemsInCircle()
Positions all menu items around the owner-component, 30 degrees apart.

setVisible

public void setVisible(boolean visible)
Makes this menu (items included) visible or invisible, depending on the parameter.

Specified by:
setVisible in interface org.mt4j.components.interfaces.IMTComponent
Overrides:
setVisible in class org.mt4j.components.MTComponent
Parameters:
visible - Indicates wheter this menu should be visible or not. True -> visible and vice versa.
